nodes.text: According to Gungan religion, Wamka Pol was the god of games. Along with the goddess Kobble and the god Nododo, he was one of the less serious Gungan deities.

This deity only appeared in the French edition of the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds, in the database entry pertaining to the Gungan society. This detail was absent from the English version of the entry. Several other deities such as Balam, Mekamok or Nododo, are also exclusive to the French version of the database. Though most of these names were not used in any other source, Nododo was set to appear in The Essential Guide to Episode I before it was cancelled.
